local.name: Local Storage
local.description: Local storage is a basic stroage type for Backend.AI. This is usually the case when Backend.AI cluster is using the compute node's storage right away.

L3.name: L3: Lablup LargeData Lake
L3.description: L3 is a lablup storage environment specialized in interworking between on-premises and cloud environments. It uses CephFS-based cold storage and a dedicated cache to implement a bottleneck-free data exchange in an inter-node environment.
